overview:
Tim Murphy joined Payzone in October 2003 as Chief Operating Officer. He has over 20 years’ experience in the financial services sector having previously held a variety of senior leadership roles with Dun & Bradstreet most notably President of North America, Managing Director of the UK & Ireland and Executive Vice President responsible for Emerging Markets, European Operations and Marketing.

Tim is also non-Executive Chairman of Improveline, a provider of home insurance claim services to many of the UK’s major insurance companies. Tim holds a BA in Economics and Political Science from Colgate University and an MBA from New York University.
